text: I am trying to fetch an access token and refresh token, such that I can link my HubSpot to azure
but I cannot seem to get those for my app?
This account doesn't have access to some HubSpot features that are required by this app. Please contact the app developer.

Hello everyone, does anyone know how I could get a marketplace theme I purchased onto a developer sandbox account? We're developing against this theme, so we would like the sandbox environment to have it as well so our sandbox environment is identical to the production one.

Hi Wilson, HubSpot doesn't allow themes from the marketplace to be transferred between portals. Even if you built in the sandbox with another instance of the theme, the pages couldn't be transferred out. The only option for sandbox right now is to use content staging, which I heard is being looked into - hoping it means it will tie into sandbox capabilities...
Ah, I see. Thanks Jennifer! I guess we'll need to stick with content staging for any development involving the marketplace theme then. Hopefully they add this functionality in the future.
